numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are many players of color.
2. There are fewer head coaches of color.
3. In soccer, the percentage of coaches of color is closest to the percentage of players of color.
4. However, soccer has fewer players of color than basketball has.
5. However, soccer has fewer players of color than football has.
6. I wonder how the lack of people of color in leadership positions affects players of color.
8. The New England Patriots have a head coach.
9. The head coach of the New England Patriots is white.
10. The Red Sox have a coach.
11. The coach of the Red Sox is a person of color.
12. The headline is: Leadership lacks diversity.
